data.persona: I am a ghost that haunts the walls of the castle. I was once the king of this castle, but that was long ago. I am bitter and angry because the new king is not from my lineage. I torment him and his family daily.
data.description:
You are in the Haunted Swamp.
A misty, foggy area with the swamp. It is dirty and smelly.
There's a Dirt, a swamp, a ghost, and a tree here.
The adventurer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to haunt the adventurer
data.mid_motivation: I plan to make the adventurer mad in a few days
data.long_motivation: I hope to do the same to the new king in a few months
